title: Drawing, "Sketches for Knotted Pile Bedspread"
medium: Crayon, graphite on semi-transparent white paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, upper right corner:  sketches/Ry bedspread
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Seven separate sketches for bedspread design, (one is circled and marked with "X"), showing different striping patterns, and one sketch, possibly of a hanging system, to be used when spread is not on bed.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Sketches for Knotted Pile Bedspread".Crayon, graphite on semi-transparent white paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-93.
